message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.SOC, cs.DL 

The paper presents a novel, automated method for identifying linked news stories from within a corpus of articles, which involves techniques drawn from the field of information retrieval and clustering techniques taken from the field of network analysis. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper also involves social network analysis (cs.SOC), natural language processing (cs.CL), and deep learning (cs.DL) techniques. Finally, the paper also discusses the prevalence and dynamics of news stories, which could fall under the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
